divs: Sighting Details"R" my Girlfriend came out of guest House looked up saw it. Ran to my house got me! I looked up! Took Few Sec. To Register! It was Fiery red Orb! Looked like Asteroid but no smoke behind it! Flew Horizontal slowed Down shot straight up! Hovered Min. Then shot thru Cloud Cover! Disappeared! I have never seen one! Didn't think I ever would! Few friends saw it! Plus whole street party ! Fire in Sky! Not saying Aliens! Just Unidentified!!
Summary: It was red fiery bigger than P. heli. Never seen anything like it! Sober! Cruising Speed! Ascended! Hovered Min.
